experiences.description: Efficiently managed and maintained the company’s Wordpress website by developing a Python program that uses Selenium to automate the process of creating, updating, and deleting products from a csv file, reducing 2 months of manual labor to just 4 hours. Also Managed the company’s server system, including configuring the VPN server for remote access and upgrading the storage of the NAS server.

Contributed to the development of a cognitive linguistic research group’s website at the University of Waterloo. I worked on both the frontend, using Next.js and TypeScript, and the backend, using a Golang REST API. I created responsive and intuitive interfaces using NextJS components and Material UI. To ensure optimal website performance and maintain high code quality, I utilized GitLab pipeline for testing and linting. I also streamlined development processes by transitioning the front-end framework from Ant Design to Material-UI. Additionally, I created a backend endpoint that dissociates an instance with a figure.

Developed a Python program that efficiently extracted residential property information and images from a Japanese real estate website using BeautifulSoup4. The program then automatically entered the data into the company’s WordPress website using Selenium, streamlining the data entry process.
